name: Olea's Messenger
description:
Olea's Messenger is the tale of a man trying to survive in a broken world, where the goddess of death is no longer there
to take care of all the forlorn spirits that lost their life.

With her last breath, she whispers.. and awakens the defender of long forgotten times.
Now, the man, imbued with the defenders soul must find his courage to restore the balance and rescue the goddess of death from her prison.


Olea's Messenger offers a breathing 2D world to explore.
Action-packed combat in an interconnected world in classic metroidvania style.
Learn new spells to progress in your mission and don't be afraid to stray from the right path.
Memorize obstacles on your journey that seem to be insurmountable,as they may seem manageable as you get stronger and learn new spells.

Treasures await for those that are curious.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Grow your hero to your desires

Old magic lies in many old artifacts that can be found in the world of Olea's Messenger. These can be equipped to change your hero's stats and spells.
The game offers a fastpaced combat system with melee, ranged attacks, combos and doging.
Your sword can be transformed into different weapons as you find the matching spell.
Do you prefer the agility of a sword, the heavy crushing hits of a warhammer, or the safe range of a bow?
After the collapse of Olea's Temple, pieces of it can be found all around the kingdom. These can increase your health and mana.


　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Features
  • Handdrawn pixelart

  • Explore a big interconnected World

  • Find Survivors in this broken World to learn more about it

  • Create your own play style

  • Fight challenging enemies and frightening bosses

  • Collect old artifacts to change your stats and skills to your liking

  • Learn and master new spells to defeat your enemies and find ways to new areas

  • Challenging puzzles
　　　　　　　　　　Each level is handcrafted, no procedural generation!
